results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2008)
results.brief_description: Eight members of the general public in Melbourne create stories about the things the resonate strongly with them, whether that is the sense of home, the love of family or cherished memories.

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007)
results.creator_credit: Terry Melvin, Robyn Colls, Maria McCarthy, Laura Brearley, David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life changing events, the experience of Italian immigrants, tributes to loved ones. These four digital stories, created by members of the public and facilitated by ACMI staff, are a biographical record of things closest to the hearts of the participants.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Terry Melvin, Robyn Colls, Maria McCarthy, Laura Brearley, David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2007)
results.creator_credit: Sue Silk, Sonya Waters, Sally McCutcheon, Martin Zerfas, Lyn McLeavy, Louise Blake, Llywellyn Staiff, Joyce Evans, Edwin Whiting, Christine Lamb, Alfred Zerfas, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Eleven stories from members of the general public. Mostly autobiographical, they are stories that concern themselves mostly with the passions of the creator, whether social issues, history, hobbies or family. These passions and interests are what makes the participants who they are.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sue Silk, Sonya Waters, Sally McCutcheon, Martin Zerfas, Lyn McLeavy, Louise Blake, Llywellyn Staiff, Joyce Evans, Edwin Whiting, Christine Lamb, Alfred Zerfas, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (June 2010)
results.creator_credit: Penny Morison, Melanie Steptoe, Jimmy Pasakos, Deborah Horne, Barbara Lemon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: These five stories were created by members of the general public as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI. On the most part, the stories are tributes to the people in the participants families that have been important or inspiring them. They employ a variety of storytelling techniques that best convey the emotion and intention of the stories.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Penny Morison, Melanie Steptoe, Jimmy Pasakos, Deborah Horne, Barbara Lemon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Digital Storytelling Express workshop
results.brief_description: Four stories as created by members of the general public for Digital Storytelling’s DST Express workshop. These stories, all of less than two minutes, cover life changing events, major lessons and inspirational family members.
